form_field.description: The field of the form to use for the auto-assign configuration (used for form_field_email)

form_key.description: The key of the form to use for the auto-assign configuration (used for form_field_email)

type.description: The type of auto-assign configuration to use

value.description: The value to use for the auto-assign configuration (used for client_org_role and primary_email)
